name: iBugs Invasion — Top & Best Game for Kids and Adults
name_original: iBugs Invasion — Top & Best Game for Kids and Adults
description:
Alert: it’s a bugs invasion! They congest your house and threaten to capture the land. They are numerous and fast, so get your fingers ready! Kick the bugs!

Hold your iPad or iPhone and start the war against these creatures now! Tap the screen to squash as many as you can before the time runs out.

GAME FEATURES:
- High quality graphics and sounds
- Realistic animations of all insects
- Random backgrounds
- GameCenter scores board

PLAY MODES:
- Single game
- Dual game - play with your friends
- Easy mode - with slower movement

BONUSES:
- Spray Can
- Extra Time
- Bomb
- Сircular Saw
